subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Jens Voigt successfully defended his title in the Tour of Germany, finishing 1 minute 57 seconds ahead of Levi Leipheimer of Discovery Channel. Voigt, a German who rides for CSC, won Friday’s time trial, making yesterday’s 89-mile stage a formality.
